summary: REQ-1 required publishing Draft Version 15 to production without introducing additional code/asset changes. The diff shows multiple code and documentation changes (including backend logic changes and a new deployment guide), which contradicts the constraint/AC that production should run the exact same code/assets as Draft Version 15.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current Draft Version 15 build as the live/production deployment without introducing any additional feature changes beyond what is already in Draft Version 15.
missing_requirements.reason: The acceptance criteria requires no additional commits/changes introduced solely for publishing, but the diff includes new and modified files (backend code changes and new docs/state files). A pure publish/release step is not reflected; instead, source changes are present.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a detailed frontend deployment guide and expanded smoke test checklist (including many UI/feature verifications unrelated to a pure publish step).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained the work to only the publish/release step with no new product features or UI/UX changes; adding new documentation/process content is a change not requested by REQ-1.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend authorization and state/logic changes (e.g., use of AccessControl/MixinAuthorization, profile query authorization checks, and other backend code modifications).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include backend schema/state migrations or resets, and the requirement was to publish the existing build without additional feature changes; modifying backend code goes beyond a pure deployment step.

hallucinated_features.description: Front-end behavioral/product changes described (public access messaging on login, dashboards accessible to all users without auth gating, new admin/player/team management UI behaviors, auction button additions, new animations/config, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request forbids new product features or UI/UX changes and asked only to publish Draft Version 15 as-is; the modified summary text indicates additional/changed UI behaviors and features.
